name: Highway of Hell
description:
Shoot your way through the Highway of Hell in this crazy shootem up.

Dodge the incoming vehicles, or blow them to bits to earn some points. Get hit and you lose a life and points. Run out of lives and the game is over.

Grab the power ups that magically fall from the sky. These will help you in your quest to blow everything up.

In Standard mode, if you survive 2 minutes you get to face the boss. Beat it to win the game. Be warned. This is no easy feat. Good luck!

Controls:

A and D - Move left and right

SHIFT - toggle up aim / down

SPACEBAR - shoot the hell out of the enemies
